About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello am Ebrima konteh Heiling from the Gambia. I am second year student at the University of The Gambia marjoring computer science. I am graphic designer and a font-end developer. I started graphic designing in 2019 and did you many projects on graphic designing. I was born and rised in a small village of Badibu Banni. I did my Senior school in Nusrat Senior Schoool as a science student.

GOMINDZ

font end developer
2020-2021

I did a web development programme at GOMINDZ for seven months. During my time as a recuirut, I became a font-end developer and build may amazing websites from strach I also have the oppornity to meet new people who are really pushing the tech industry in The Gambia and had an amazing conversation with them about the future of technology in The Gambia.

Graphic Designer

Self employed
2019 to date
